c74object.name: the.render.settings
c74object.digest: Query and modify settings of the.jit.renderer~
c74object.description:
Written by Tim Heinze Â© 2020, www.xenorama.com.
Query existing settings upon object launch and receive updates during operation.
Consider this a dict-bound pattr-approximation within children of a render context hosted by the.jit.renderer~

objarg.name: render-context
objarg.digest: Specify a named render context to bind to.

objarg.name: settings-dictionary
objarg.digest: Specify a named dictionary to query the directory (dir entry) from.
objarg.description: Inherited from parent patcher as #1_[dictionary], mostly likely #1_settings

objarg.name: entry
objarg.description: If it is not contained, the default value will be output

objarg.name: default
objarg.digest: Specify the default if entry is not contained

attribute.name: listen
attribute.digest: Specify a receive port from which entry updates are to be expected
attribute.description:
Specify a receive port from which entry updates are to be expected. The corresponding send-port is coded into the.jit.renderer~.
Note that this settings can only by hard-coded into the object box and any such message will be ignored.

attribute.name: default
attribute.digest: Specify the default if entry is not contained
attribute.description:
Can default to anything. Same as argument #4.
Note that this settings can only by hard-coded into the object box and any such message will be ignored.

attribute.name: update
attribute.digest: Specify the a named port to receive data when changed manually
attribute.description: Will send the entry with the value applied in rightmost inlet to the given receive port, if provided. Otherwise will only change the key in the settings-dictionary only.
